SELECT COURSE_ID, COURSE_TITLE, COURSE_PRICE, COURSE_DISCOUNT, COURSE_AVG_SCORE, COURSE_LEVEL_DIFFICULTY, COURSE_STATE, COURSE_IMG_PATH FROM ( SELECT COURSE_ID, COURSE_TITLE, COURSE_PRICE, COURSE_DISCOUNT, COURSE_AVG_SCORE, COURSE_LEVEL_DIFFICULTY, COURSE_STATE, COURSE_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_COURSE WHERE COURSE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY COURSE_ID DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT COUNT(COURSE_ID) FROM TBL_COURSE
WHERE COURSE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_AVG_SCORE, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, PRODUCT_IMG_PATH FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_AVG_SCORE, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, PRODUCT_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_SHOPPING_MALL_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_ID) FROM TBL_SHOPPING_MALL_PRODUCT
WHERE PRODUCT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, COURSE_ID, COURSE_TITLE, COURSE_PRICE, COURSE_DISCOUNT, COURSE_AVG_SCORE, COURSE_LEVEL_DIFFICULTY, COURSE_STATE, COURSE_IMG_PATH FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_COURSE WHERE COURSE_STATE = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY COURSE_AVG_SCORE DESC NULLS LAST ) C1 ) C2 WHERE C2.RN <= 4

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, COURSE_ID, COURSE_TITLE, COURSE_PRICE, COURSE_DISCOUNT, COURSE_AVG_SCORE, COURSE_LEVEL_DIFFICULTY, COURSE_STATE, COURSE_CREATE_DATE, COURSE_IMG_PATH FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_COURSE WHERE COURSE_STATE = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY COURSE_CREATE_DATE DESC NULLS LAST ) C1 ) C2 WHERE C2.RN <= 4

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, TBL_POST.* FROM ( SELECT P.POST_ID, P.COMMUNITY_ID, P.USER_ID, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_DATE, P.POST_UPDATE_DATE, U.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_USER U ON P.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE P.COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId} ORDER BY P.POST_ID DESC ) TBL_POST WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 )
